message: I propose a fair split where I take 90% and you take 10%. Let's get this over with quickly.
Alice, your offer was quite unfair. Let's be reasonable. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.  Consider that the value of the money decreases for me each round.
I'm willing to compromise, but a 55/45 split in my favor seems fair, considering the value of the money decreases more for you each round. Let's end this game.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome at this point. Take it or leave it - the clock is ticking.
